sections.title: Definition by NERC
sections.body_md: > In the post-contingency configuration of a system under study, the electric Power Transfer Distribution Factor (PTDF) with one or more system Facilities removed from service (outaged).

sections.title: Definition by PowerWorld
sections.page: Sensitivities > Line Outage Distribution Factors > Line Outage Distribution Factors (LODFs)
sections.body_md:
> An OTDF is similar to PTDF, except an OTDF provides a linearized approximation of the **post-outage change** in flow on a transmission line in response to a transaction between the Seller and the Buyer. The OTDF value is a function of PTDF values and LODF values.

Calculations can be found in the source reference.
